Rigereria, chisegi chiabo nigo chire chintindi mono egati yabo boka abanyene, na ase engencho yokogecha bakababeka abanephi ase ogokwa ase engencho batamokorerete Kristo.
Nainche Moroni tinkonyara komokana Kristo; aseigo, nigo inkumetie keria ingokora ase ogokonya obogima bwane omonyene.

Aseigo, nigo inkorika ebinto bike, mamincha naria naganetie; na nigo natagete ayanga aya tarikwa naende; korende nigo inkorika amang’ana make, kero kende nabo arabe agokonya abaminto, Abalamani ase amatuko agocha; koreng’ana n’okobua kw’Omonene.

chapters.name: Egesieri 2
summary: Igoro y’obuya bw’Omoika omochenu ase abanephi ikomi nababere.
verses: Amang’ana a’Yeso akwanete ase aborokigwa baye, bari ikomi nababere baria achorete, buna abegete amaboko igoro ase bare.

Na akabarangeria ase amarieta nagoteba ng’a, mobe mokomorangeria Tata ase erieta riane, ase amasabo amanene; na ekero mwakorire aya imobe mokonyora chinguru ase oria morabekere amaboka aino, na imobae Omoika omochenu; na ase erieta riane imoyorwe, ase abatomwa bane.

Na bono aya naro amang’ana a Kristo yeritang’ani akwanete ase ogocha kwaye kweritong’ani; na omoganda tobete okoigwa, korende aborokigwa bakaigwa, na bonsi baria babekeretwe amaboko Omoika omochenu okobacherwa.

chapters.name: Egesieri 3
summary: Igoro y’ogochorwa kwa abakuani na aborokia.
verses: Chingencho chiria aborokigwa, baria barenge korokwa abagaka b’ekanisa, bakabachora abakuani na aborokia –
Na ekero basaba ase Tata ase erieta ria Kristo, bakabeka amaboko abo igoro yabo na goteba ng’a:

Ase erieta ria Yeso Kristo nagochorire aye koba omokuani, (gose onye otakeire koba omworokia) nagochorine aye koba omworokia, ase okorandia okaangama na okwaberwa kw’ebibe goetera ase Yeso Kristo, ase okoremereria gw’okwegena erieta riaye goika omoerio. Amina
Na ase engencho eye bakabachora abakuani na aborokia, koreng’ana nebiegwa na okorangerigwa kwa Nyasae ase abanto; naboigo bakabachora ase chinguru chiomoika omochenu oria orenge ime yabo.

chapters.name: Egesieri 4
summary: Enchera y’okorwa omogati ase emesa y’omonene.
verses: Chingencho chiabagaka babo na abakuani korwa omobere oYeso na amanyinga aye ase ekanisa; na nigo bagokora aya koreng’ana namachiko a Kristo, aseigo twamanyire chingencho goika ase ekeene; na abagaka na abakuani bakaba bakorwa emesa y’Omonene–
Naboigo bakabeka amaru abo inse amo nekanisa, na gosaba ase Tata ase erieta ria Kristo bagoteba ng’a:

O Nyasae, Tata okare na kare nigo togosaba ase ore ase erieta ria Yeso Kristo, gosesenia na koyochena omogati oyo ase emioyo yonsi ya baria bakoyoimokia, erinde banyare koria ase okoinyora omobere bw’omwana Oo, na koba birori ase ore, Oo Nyasae Tate okare nakare, ekiagera berure koribogoria igoro yabo erieta ri, omwana Oo, na koimoinyora botambe, na koyarenda amachiko aria abeire, okobaa; erinde banyare koba botambe bare amo n’omoika oye. Amina.

chapters.name: Egesieri 5
summary: Engencho y’okorwa edivai ase emesa y’Omonene.
verses: Engenche y’okorwa edivai – – Rigereria, bakabogoria egekombe, na goteba:

O Nyasae Tata okarie na kare nigo togosaba ase ore ase erieta ri’omwana Oo Yeso Kristo, onyare gosesenia na koyechena edivai eye ase emioyo yonsi ya baria bakoyenywa, erinde banyare gokora igo ase okoinyora amanying’a y’omwana oo, aria aiterete ase bare; erinde banyare koba birori ase ore, Oo Nyasae Tata okare na kare, erinde banyare komoinyora botambe, na bayare koba amo n’omoika oye.

chapters.name: Egesieri 6
summary: Amang’ana na chingencho chiebatiso – – Ebisusuro bi’ekanisa.
verses: Na bono nigo ingokwana igoro y’ebatiso. Rigereria, abagaka na abakuani na aborokia mbabatisetwe; na tibatisetwe bosa igo gotatiga ekero baorogetie amatunda aria y’obuya.
Na tibanyorete kende ase ebatiso gotatiga bachete nomoyo ore inse amo n’omoika bw’obwororo, na komanyekana ase ekanisa ng’a ekeene baangamire ebibe biabo bionsi.
Na onde tari obatisetwe goika are koba ore nerieta ria Kristo, ore nomoyo bw, okomokorera goika omoerio.

Na ekero banyora ebatiso, na gosibigwa n’Omoika omochenu bakaba bakobarwa ase abanto bekanisa ya Kristo; na amarieto akairwa ase okoinyorwa na korosigwa ase obuya bwa Nyasae, na kobarenda ase enchera angiya, kobarenda botambe ase amasabo, abo ore ase omogoko o’Kristo, oyorenge omochakano na omoerio bw’okwegena kwabo.
Naboigo ekanisa ekaba ekonyorana botembe, kweng’ata na gosaba, na gokwana barobwo ase barobwo igoro y’ogokonyeka gwe chinkoro chiabo.
Naboigo bakaba bakoumerana botambe ase okoria omogati na edivai, ase okomoinyora Omonene Yeso.

Na bakaba bare amo n’obororo ng’a onde bwensi taba ore nebibe ase bare; na onde bwensi ore gotoka ore nebibe na birori batato bamoire bobe ase obosio bw’abagaka, na onye tibakwaangama, na koorokia obobe, amariete abo nigo are korusigwa aroro na tibabarwa ase egati ya abanto ba Kristo.
Korende buna babete bagendererete ase okoangama na koboria okwaberwa, ase omoyo bw’okogania, imbabete bakwaberwa.

Na emesangererekano yabo nigo yare koragwa n’ekanisa ekero Omoika omochenu ore gokora emeremo, na goetera ase chinguru chi’Omoika Omochenu; bakaba bakoraua gochia korandia, gose koagacha, gose gosaba gose komotogia gose gotera naboigo aya akaba agokoreka.

chapters.name: Egesieri 7
summary: Moroni akarwa amorokererio amormoni ase okwegena, ogosemeria, na obwanchani.
verses: Na bono inche moroni nkorika inde make aria Tata Mormoni akwanete igoro yokwegena, ogosemeria na obwanchani; nyuma ase aya akaba ogokwana ase abanto, na akaborokereria ase esinagogi eria baagachete ase bagosabera.

Nabono inche Mormoni, nabatebirie; inwe abaminto ng’a obuya bwa Tata Nyasae na Omwana Yeso Kristo na okobua kwaye ogochenu, ase engencho yekeegwa kiaye giokorangerigwa kwaye ase inde, erinde nario indanyore ribaga gokwana nainwe bono.

Aseigo nigo inganetie gokwana aria are igoro yekanisa aria are ase obuya bwa Kristo, na aria anyorire ogosemeria ase moranyare gosoa ase ogotimoka kw’omonene, korwa engaki eye goika engaki yogotimoka nere aria igoro.
Nabono abaminto nagambire ebinto ebi ase engencho yaino na obuya bwaino na gwatora ase abana bamwanyabanto.
Korende nainyoire ring’ana ri’Omonene Nyasae, rigoteba ng’a ase ogokora kwabo imobamanye ase amakoro abo; onye emeremo yabo ere emiya, naboigo nabarobwo nigo bare abaya.
Rigereria Nyasae otebire ng’a omonto ore bwebibe takonyara gokora amaya; ekiagera onye okorwa ekeegwa, gose gosaba ase Nyasae, gotatiga oyakorire ase ekeene na atari komokonya.
Rigereria tabaririe ase are ase oboikeranu.
Rigereria onye omonto ore obwekerecha okorwa ekeegwa, nigo agokora bosa; aseigo nigo ebarire ase are buna oria onyorire ekeegwa; aseigo oyo nigo abarire ekerecha ase obosio bwa Nyasae.
Naboigo nigo abarire ekerecha ase abanto onye ogosaba na tari na okwegena ase enkoro yaye; takonyora kende na Nyasae nakoira oyonga oyo.
Aseigo, omonto ore ekerecha takonyara gokora amaya, gose korwa ekeegwa ekiya.

Rigereria ensonko endoro teri korwa amache amaya, gose ensoko engiya korwa amache amaroro, aseigo omonto ore omosomba obirecha takomobwatia Kristo, na onye okomobwatia Kristo nabo tari omosomba bwebirecha.

Na ebinto ebiya bionsi nigo bikorwa ase Nyasae; na biria bire ebibe nigo bire ebia birecha; ekiagera birecha nigo are omobisa oNyasae, na nigo akomorwania botambe, na kogenka na gotebia gokora ebibe, na gokora aria ayobobe botambe.
Korende rigereria, ng’a aria are aya’Nyasae nigo agotebia ayare amaya; botambe, aseigo kera egento gegokora amaya, na komwancha Nyasae, na komokorera, nigo are oichire na Nyasae.
Aseigo, rende inwe abaminto, timoboria aria amabe koba aya Nyasae, gose amang’ana amaya aNyasae koba aya birecha.

Rigereria inwe abaminto arurwe ase more monachere, erinde nario moranyare koba mokomanya amaya na amabe; na chinchera chiokonachera nigo chire chindonge, ng’a nario morabe nobong’aini obuya buna omobaso korwa ase omosunte.

Omoika o’Kristo nigo orure ase kera omonto, erinde nario baramanye amaya korwa ase amabe; narorire ase more enchera yokonachera; kera egento gegoteba gokora amaya na goteba kwegena ime ya Kristo; nigo arure ase chinguru na ekeegwa gia Kristo na komanya obong’aini obuya bwa Nyasae.

Korende amang’ana aya agotebia abanto, gokora ebibe, na gotegena ime ya Kristo, na komokana na gotamokorera Nyasae, na imomanye more nobong’aini oboikeranu nigo bore obwebirecha; na ase engencho eye nigo ere emeremo ya Saitani; ekiagere ere tari gotebia onde gokora amaya nonya nase amaraika aye; nase baria bamoigwerete.

Nabono, abaminto, mwarorire na komanya oborabu moranyare kogambia, oborabu baria bore ase Kristo, na korora ng’a okogambia kwaino nigo kore akuya; ekiagera okonachera koria mokonacha nakwo morache konacherwa.
Aseigo, nabasoroire inwe abaminto, monyare korigia oborabu bwa Kristo erinde nario moramanye obuya korwa ase obobe; na kamorabogorie aria are amaya, na timogambia erio imobe mokoba abana ba Kristo.
Nabono, abaminto, inaki ere buya ase okobogoria amang’ana amaya?
Na bono na chire ase okwegena, aria ingwenerete gokwana; na nimbe inkobatebia enchera moranyare konyora amang’ana amaya.

Manya Nyasae nigo amanyete kera egento korwa omochakano goika kare na kare, rigerereria agatoma amaraika kworokia abana ba mwanyabanto, koorokia igoro yogocha kwa Kristo; na ime ya Kristo kera egento noo gegotoka.
Na Nyasae boigo akabatebia ababani ase omonwa oye, ng’a Kristo nache.
Na nigo chiarenge chinchera chinyinge ase okweorokia ase mwanyabanto, aria arenge amaya; na amang’ana onsi are amaya akorwa ase Kristo; karga abanto nigo bagwete na kende kiya tikiare gocha ase bare.

Aseigo, okworokereria kwa amaraika na ase amang’ana akorwa ase omonwa o’Nyasae, abanto bagakana kworokia okwegena ase Kristo, na ase okwegena bakabogoria kera egento kere ekiya; goika engaki yogocha gwa Kristo.

Nyuma ase aya agacha na abanto bonsi bagatoreka ase okwegena erieta riaye; na ase okwegena, bakaba abana ba Nyasae. Na buna Kristo are moyo nigo akwanete amang’ana ase Tata ogoteba ng’a: Kende gionsi morasabe Tata ase erieta riane, kere ekiya, ase okwegena ng’a imokenyore, ekeene eke imokorerwe.
Aseigo, abaminto, ebikone nigo biakendire asengencho Kristo achire igoro, na goikaransa ase okoboko gwokorio kwa Nyasae, komotebia Tata obokeene na amabera aorogetie ase mwanyabanto.

Aseigo oiraneire omoerio bwogochika, nakobateba baria bonsi bamwegenete; na baria babwate okwegena ase are mbabe igoro ase amang’ana amaya; naboigo nigo atenenerete abana ba mwanyabanto; na nigo amanyete igoro kare nakare.
Na ase engencho akorire aya, abaminto ebikone biakendire bori? Rigereria nabatebirie ng’a nonya namaraika taratiga kobaranderia abana ba mwanyabanto.
Rigereria nigo bamoigwerete kworokereria koreng’ana nogochika kwaye kweorokia abanyene nechinguru, chiokwegena na ebirengererio ebikong’u ase enchera ende yonsi yobonyasae.

Na emeremo yabo nokorangeria abanto bonsi koangama, na goikerania na gokora emeremo yeira ya Tata eria abegete ase abana ba mwanyabanto ase okorwa ring’ana ria Kristo ase ebibekerero ebichore bi’Omonene ng’a babe bakorwa oborori bwaye.

Na ase ogokora bo Omonene Nyasae orosirie enchera eyio abanto barabe bakonyora okwegena ime ya Kristo, na nario Omoika Omochenu oranyore aase ase chinkoro chiabo, koreng’ana nechinguru chireo; na aya Omonene nayakore goetara ase, eira eria abegete ase abana ba abanto.
Na Kristo agateba ng’a: onye mokoba nokwegena ime yane imokore kende gionsi ingokora.
Naboigo agateba ng’a: angama inwe mwensi amore chinsinyo chiense na inchwo ase inde, na kobatiswa ase erieta riane erinde monyare gotoreka.

Na bono, abaminto, onye ebinto ebi nakwanire bire ekeene ase more, Omonene nabe okoorokia chinguru na obonene bwaye ase amatuko y’omoerio ng’a amang’ana aya nigo are ayekeene, na onye are ayekeene inee ebikone bi’Omonene biasirire?
Inee amaraika atigire gocha ase abana bamwanyabanto, gose asiririe Omoika Omochenu korwa ase bare? Inee nabe ogotenena buna engaki egoeta arakore ense gotenena gose omonto oyomo nabeo oratoreke?

Ekeene nabatebirie tekoba, nasengencho yokwegena nakio, gekogera ebikone bigocha; na nase okwegena nakio gekogera amaraika akweorokia nakworokereria abanto; aseigo onye ebinto ebi tibikoba rirorio okoragererigwa kobe ase abanto na asengencho yogotegena na onsi nigo are ayabosa.

Aseigo onde taiyo orakonyeke, koreng’ana namang’ana a Kristo, gotatiga mwabeire nokwegena ase erieta riaye, aseigo onye ebinto ebi bigokenda naboigo okwegena goika gokende, na obobe ase obomenyo bwa omonto ekiagera nigo bare buna baria batamanyeti ng’a ogotoreka ngwachete.
Korende rigereria inwe abaminto nigo inkorigereria ebinto ebiya biaino, nigo naganirie mobe nokwegena ime ya Kristo; onye timokoba nokwegena ase are timokobarwa ase egati ya abanto bekanisa yaye.
Naboigo abaminto nigo intagete kobatebia igoro yogosemeria. Ng’a narenga moranyare konyora ase okwegena, mbuya kanga ndiria mwanyora ogosemeria?

Na eye nero engencho enganeirie ase ogosemeria? Nabatebirie ng’a mobe more nogosemeria goetera ase ekengwanso gia Kristo na ase chinguru chiokobokigwa kwaye, ase okobokigwa ase obogima bwa kare na kare na aya nigo are asengencho yokwegena koreng’ana neira yaye.
Aseigo onye omonto obwate okwegena goika abe nogosemeria; aseigo kwegena gotaiyo gosemeria ngokoba aroro.
Ekeene nabatebirie naende ng’a takoba nokwegena na ogosemeria, gotatiga obeire omwororo na obwate enkoro ebwate oboitongo.

Onye ekoba bo okwegena kwaye nigo kore bosa, kende tikeri kerancheranwe na Nyasae, gotatiga obeire omwororo na ore noboitongo bwenkoro; onye omonto okoba nobwororo bwenkoro na goteba ng’a Yeso nomwana oNyasae, goika naende abe nobwanchani; na onye tabwati obwanchani nigo aganeirie abe nobwanchani.

Na obwanchani nigo bokoremereria, na obwororo, na tibobwati endamwamu, na tibori gwetogia, tibori kwerigereria, tari bwango gotogonya, tari korengereria bibe, na tibori kogoka ase amabe korende kogokera ekeene, nigo bokobogoria ebinto bionsi na kwegena ebinto bionsi, nagosemeria ebinto bionsi, nakoremereria ebinto bionsi.
Aseigo abaminto, onye timokoba nobwanchani, nigo morabe bosa, ekiagera obwanchani tibori gokea. Aseigo kabe ase obwanchani, obwe bore obonene ase onsi, ekiagera kera egento nkegwe –
Korende obwanchani nigo bore obwa Kristo, na nigo bokoremereria kare na kare; na onde bwensi oranyorekane obobwate ase amatuko y’omoerio, nebe buya ase are.

Aseigo, inwe abaminto, saba ase Tata ase chinguru chionsi chienkoro, erinde nario oraichorwe nobwanchani obo, obwe arwete ase baria bare ababwatia bekeene ase omwana oye Yeso Kristo; erinde nario morabe abanto ba Nyasae; ekiagera ekero agocha intobe buna ere, na intomorore buna are; erinde tonyare koba nogosemeria oko; erinde nario torabe togokorwa abachenu koreng’ana buna ere are omochenu. Amina.

chapters.name: Egesieri 8
summary: Rirube ria Mormon ase Moroni – – Abana abake tibari nokogania koangama gose kobatiswa.
verses: Rirube ria Tata Mormoni, ririkire ase inde, na nigo riarigetwe bwango ekero narangeretigwe ase enchiri. Na ase obong’aini akarika ogoteba ng’a:
Omwana one omwanchwa Moroni, nigo inde nomogoko ekiagera Omonene Yeso Kristo nare nomoyo naye, na okorangerie ase emeremo yaye emechenu.

Na nigo inde nomoyo ase ore ime ya amasabo ane botambe, botembe ime ya amasabo ase Nyasae Tata ase erieta ria Yeso Kristo oyore omochenu, erinde ere goetera ase ogotakea kwaye na obuya bwaye na mbokorende goetera ase okoremereria gw, okwegena ase erieta riaye goika omoerio.
Na bono, abana bane, nigo ingokwana ase more igoro yaria angechetie mono; aseigo nigo angechetie ng’a emechando nebe ase more.
Onye neorokereirie ekeene, emchando kanya nere egati yaino igoro y’okobatisa abana baino abake.
Na bono, abana bane, nigo inde nokogania ng’a mokong’e ase obong’aini, erinde nario obobe obo borarusigwe ase egati yaino; na ase okogania oko imbwate narikire rirube eri.
Erio kegima ekero namanya amang’ana aya igoro yaino inkamoboria Omonene igoro ya amang’ana aya. Na ring’ana ri’Omonene rigacha ase inde goetera ase chinguru chi’Omoika omochenu, nagontebia:

Tegerera amang’ana a Kristo, oyore omoboria oino, Omonene oino na Nyasae oino. Rigereria tinachete ase ense korangeria abachenu korende abanyabibe ase okoangama; okogania gwonsi tari ase abang’ani korende ase abarwaire; aseigo abana abake nigo bare bonsi, ekiagera tibaraisana gokora ebibe; okoragererigwa gwa Adamu kwarusigwe korwa ase bare ase inde, ekiagera tikobwati nguru chinde chionsi ase bare; na ogochika gw’okwaroka gwakorirwe ime yane.
Na ekero aya aera Omoika Omochenu okaorokia ring’ana ria Nyasae ase inde; aseigo abana bane abanchwa, inwe manya necheche enene ase obosio bwa Nyasae, ekero abana obake bakobatiswa.

Rigereria nigo inkobatebia ng’a ebinto ebi mobe mokobiorokereria – – okoangama na kobatiswa, ase baria babarire ase baria bare abang’aini ase ogokora ebibe; borokererie abaibori ng’a goika baangame na kobatiswa, na kwebeka inse boka abanyene buna abana babo abake, na bonsi imbatoreke na abana babo.
Na abana babo abake tibari nokogania gw’okoangama, gose kobatiswa. Rigereria, ebatiso nigo ekoba ase okoangama ase ogoikerania amachiko ase okwaberwa kwebibe.

Korende abana abake nigo bare moyo ase Kristo, nonya nkorwa oboroso bwense; onye tari bo, Nyasae nigo are Nyasae ogwatanana, na Nyasae ogoonchoka, na oyogosika abanto; aseigo abana mbarenga bakure bataranyora ebatiso.
Aseigo, onye abana abake tibagotoreka batabatisiri, aya goika agende ase omoerio ochanamu.

Rigereria nigo inkobamanyia ng’a oria ogoteba ng’a abana abake mbaganetie ebatiso nigo are ase ekebao kiobororo na ase eora yebibe, tabwati nonya nokwegena ogoke, gose ogosemeria, gose obwanchani; aseigo, nabe okonachwa ekero are ase abirengererio, na goika agende ase chanamu.
Obobe nobwabo ase abare aboro baria bagoteba ng’a Nyasae natorie omwana oyomo ase engencho yebatiso, na abande mbasire ase engencho batabatisiri.

Okoragererigwa ase bare baria bagotanga chinchera chi’Omonene ase amang’ana aya, goika basire, gotatiga baangamire. Rigereria, nigo ingokwana noboremu, imbwate okobua korwa ase Nyasae; na tindi kwoboa keria omonto arakore; ekiagera obwanchani bwekeene bwaseririe obwoba bwonsi.

Na nigo ing’ichire n’obwanchani, obwe bore obwanchani bwa kare na kare; aseigo abana bonsi nigo bagwekaine ase inde aseigo, nigo imbanchete abana abake n’obwanchani bwekeene; na nigo bonsi bagwekaine na ogotoreka n’okwabo.
Nigo imanyete ng’a Nyasae tari Nyasae ogwatanana gose oyogotema; korende nigo are oyotagoonchoka korwa kare goika kare.
Abana abake tibaganeirie koangama; aseigo nigo ere bobe na obworo obonene ase ogokara amabera a’Nyasae ase bare, ekiagera bonsi moyo bare ase are ase engencho ya amabera aye.
Na oria ogoteba ng’a abana abake mbaganetie ebatiso nigo bagokana amabera a Kristo, na korwa okwanga ase ekeng’wanso kiaye na chinguru chiogotoreka.

Okoragererigwa ase abanga aba, ekiagera nigo bare ase omotego bwa amakweri, na ase egesusuro getakoera. Nigo ingokwana n’oboremu; buna Nyasae achigete. Baigwere na bategerere, gose nigo bateneine mamincha yaino ase ekerogo giekina gia Kristo.
Korende rigereria abana baria bonsi imoyo bare ime ya Kristo, naboigo batari nogochika; aseigo oria otagambirie gose oria otari inse y’okogambigwa, tibakoangama; na ase ebatiso teri nogokonya –
Korende nogochecheria ase obosio bwa Nyasae, gokana amabera a Kristo, nechinguru chi’Omoika Omochenu, na kobeka okwegena kwabo ase emeremo ya amakweri.
Rigereria, inwe abana bane, ebinto ebi tibitakeirie bibe boigo; korende okoangama nase baria bare inse y’ekina na inse ase okoragererigwa gokobuna ogochika.
na ritunda ritang’ani riokoangama nebatiso; na ebatiso nigo egocha ase okwegena goetera ase ogoikerania amachiko; na ogoikeranigwa kwa amachiko; koreta okwaberwa kwebibe;

Na okwaberwa kwebibe koreta obwororo, na okwebeka inse gwenkoro; na ase engencho y’obwororo na oboitongo bwenkoro bwachire ogotarera kw’Omoika Omochenu goika, oyore omoremia oichire nogosemeria na obwanchani boisane, obwanchani boria bokoremereria ase obong’aini ase amasabo, goika omoerio bw’ense, ekero abachenu bonsi baramenye na Nyasae.

Rigereria, inwe abana bane ng’a nimbarikere naende ase more onye inkogenda isiko bwango mamincha ya abalamani. Rigereria obwerori bwense eye, gose abanto ba Nephi, ekiagera bamanyire ogosaria kwabo gotatiga baangamire.

Basabere, inwe abana bane, erinde nario okoangama korache ase bare. Korende rigereria, nigo inyoboete korende Omoika nigo ochandegate amo nabwe na ase ensemo eye y’oboremo obo nigo barigetie kobeka inse chinguru na okobua okwo gokorwa ase Nyasae; na bayokanire Omoika Omochenu.
Na buna bakanire mono obong’aini, ekeene abana bane, goika aba basire bwango, ase ogoikeranigwa kw’obobani okwo gwakwanetwe amo na ababani, naboigo ase amang’ana y’omotoria oito omonyene.
Ase obuya inwe abana bane, goika narikire ase more, gose imbe inkonyorana nainwe naende. Amina.

chapters.name: Egesieri 9
summary: Rirube ria-kabere ria Mormoni ase omwana oye Moroni.
verses: Inwe abana bane abanchwa, nigo nabarikeire naende erinde monyare komanya ng’a imoyo inde; korende nigo inkorika ayande ayare ayogoichania.
Rigereria, nabeire nesegi enene na abalamani, abwe totabanete; na Acheantusi ogure ase omoyio, naboigo Lurami na Emroni; na bono twabeire togosiria omobaro omonene bwa abanto abachore baito.
Na bono rigereria, inwe abana bane, nabeire nobwoba ng’a nigo barabasirie abanto aba; ekiagera bangire koangama, na Saitani nigo agendererete kobakinia ase obotindi n’obororo barobwo ase barobwo.

Rigereria, nigo inde omosomba amo nabwe kogenderera; na ekero ingokwana ring’ana ria Nyasae amo n’obwoge nigo bagotengechigwa na koba n’obororo nainche na ekero ngokwana ase obwororo bakong’ia chinkoro chiabo mamincha ya amang’ana aya; ase ayio, inyoboa korende Omoika bw’Omonene ogenderera gochandeka nabwe.
Ase obororo bwabo bokorokia ase inde ng’a tibari aboba ase ogokwa; na basiririe obwanchani bwabo barobwo ase barobwo; na nigo barenge nerang’o ya amanyinga na goakana egesiomba botambe.

Na bono, inwe abana bane, ase ogotatenena kw’obokong’u bwabo, tiga intwe tokore emeremo n’obong’aini; ekiagera onye togokana gokora emeremo, nigo torabekwe ase ekina; aseigo nigo tobwate emeremo y’okoagacha eema, nario torabue ababisa ase oboikeranu bwonsi, na gotimokia emioyo yaito ase oborwoti bwa Nyasae.

Na bono nigo inkorika makeigo igoro y’ogochandeka kwa abanto aba. Koreng’ana n’obong’aini nanyorete korwa ase Amoron, rigereria, Abalamani mbabwate abasibwa abange, abwe barusetie ase omonaro O Sherrizah; na nigo barenge abasacha na abakungu, na abana.

Na abasacha na abaise ba abakungu abwo na abana babeire bagoitwa; nabakabarageria abakungu aba chinyama chiabasacha babo naboiigo ase abana bakabarageria chinyama chia abaise; na batari na amache, gotatiga baria abare abake babete batarie.

Na ogotatenena kwogosaria okonene kwa abalamani, tiyabete egoetania ase abanto baito ime ya Moriantumu. Korende rigereria abaiseke abange begesaku kia Abalamani bakairwa buna abasibwa; na ekero bakora keria gionsi kiarenge ekieng’e ekiengencho korwa ase bare, na ayio are obotomani na obonyaka –

Na ekero bakora aya, bakaba bakobaita ase endamwamu enene, na koyesusura emebere yabo goika bagakwa; na ekero bakora gokora aya, bakayetandora emebere yabo koreng’ana buna ching’iti chiorosana chigokora, ase engencho yogokong’ia chinkoro chiabo; na bagakora aya ase okorama okonene.
O inwe abana bane, inaki ase abanto banga buna aba, abwo batari namagenderero –
(Na n’emiaka emeke yaetete, barenge bare namagenderero na koba abanto abang’aini)
Korende inwe abana bane, inaki ase abanto banga aba, ebirengererio biabo bire ime ase ogosaria.
Inaki toranyare kwegena ng’a Nyasae nabe okorusia okoboko kwaye korwa ase ekina mamincha yaito?
Rigereria, enkoro yane nkorera ere: Okoragenerigwa ase abanto aba korwa ime ase ekina, O Nyasae, bisa ebibe biabo, na obworo na ogosaria korwa ase obosio bwane.

Naboigo, abana bane, mbareo ababoraka abange nabaiseke babo abwo batigarete ime ya Sherrizah; na eyio nensemo eria. Abalamani batairete, rigereria, abasikari ba Zenephi bakairwa na bakairwa na bakabatiga bagotayaya ande onsi ase okorigia endagera na abang’ina abange bakaremerwa chinguru ase chinchera na bakaba bagokwa.
Na bono abasikari inde nabwo naboro; na abasikari ba abalamani nigo bare ase Sherrizaha na inche; naboigo abange babeire bagotama gochia ase abasikari ba Aroni bagure ase obobe bwokwerwa kwabo.
O ase obobe bwa abanto bane! Tibari n’omoroberio na tibari namabera. Rigereria, nigo inde omonto, na nimbwate korende chinguru chi’omonto, na tinkonyara kwebetereria ase amachiko ane.

Na babeire abakongu ase obworo bwabo; na babeire buna abanyabotindi; abatari koegera onde bwensi omokoro gose omoke; na nigo bebegete ase ogotakora amaya kare na kare; na ogochandeka kwa abakungu na abana baito ase obosio bwense eye okwo kobuete kera egento; imeme tichigwatora gose korikwa.

Nabono, abana bane, tinkomenya ase obomenyo obo. Rigereria, mwamanyire obworo bwa abanto aba; imomanyete ng’a tibari na boroso bonde bwonsi, na ebirengererio biaetire; na obworo bwabo bwabuire boria bwa abalamani.
Rigereria, inwe abana bane, tinkobaegera ase obosio bwa Nyasae goika angete.

Korende rigereria, inwe abana bane, nabaegereire inwe ase Nyasae, na nigo inyegenete ase Kristo ng’a goika motoreke; na nigo inkomosaba Nyasae anyare korenda obogima bwaino, koba kirori ase okoirana kwa abanto baye ase are, gose emenchando yabo; naboigo namanyire ng’a goika basire gotatiga baangamire nakoirana ase are.
Na onye bagosira nigo erabe buna ekero kia abanto ba Jaredi, ase engencho y’obokong’u bwechinkoro chiabo, ase okorigia goitera amanyinga na goakana egesiomba.

Na onye bagosira twamanyire ng’a abaminto abange nigo barairwe ase abalamani, na abange mbairwe ase bare; aseigo, rika amang’ana make, na onye mokoegerwa nainche gosira na timbarora; korende nigo inyegenete ng’a bwango nimbarore; aseigo nigo inde n’amang’ana y’obobisi intagete korwa ase more.

Aye omwana one, kabe omwegenwa ase Kristo; na ebinto nakwanire tibikogechia, nagokobeka inse ase amakweri; korende tiga Omonene Kristo akoimokie igoro, naboigo tiga ogochandeka kwaye, na ogokwa kwaye, na okoorokia kw’omobere oye ase abatata, na amabera aye na okoremereria kwaye, na ogosemeria kw’obonene bwaye na obogima bwa kare na kare, bimenye ime yao kare na kare.

Na tiga obuya bw’Omonene Nyasae, oyo ekerogo kiaye kere igoro mono, na omonene oito Yeso Kristo, oyio oikaransete ase okoboko gwokorio kw’echinguru chiaye, goika ebinto bionsi biamoigwereire ere, bibe na koba naye kare na kare. Amina.

chapters.name: Egesieri 10
summary: Okwaeri kwa Moroni ase abalamani – – Amang’a gete ase kera omonto n’oborori bwaye bw’ekeene bwe ebuku ya Mormoni ina bonyorwe – – Emeuri ya Moroni igoro ase amang’ana yabanto baye.
verses: Bono inche Moroni, nigo inkorika makeigo buna inche indonche ng’a namaya; na nigo inkorika ase abaminto, abalamani; na nigo inganetie bamanye ng’a goetania emiaka chimia inye na merongo ebere yaetire korwa ebirage birugua igoro y’ogocha gwa Kristo.
Na nigo indabeke amang’ana aya omouri, nyuma ekero nakwanire amang’ana makeigo ase enchera y,okoagacha ase more.

Rigereria, nigo nkobamanyia ng’a ekero morayasome aya onye more nechisemi ase Nyasae ng’a moyasome, erinde nario morainyore ng’a namabera angana inaki Omonene abeire okoba naro ase abana bamwanyabanto, korwa ogotongwa gwa Adamu goika engaki moranyore amang’ana aya na koyabeka ase chinkoro chiaino.

Na ekero morayanyore amang’ana aya, nigo inkobamanyia ing’a momoborie Nyasae, Tata okare na kare ase erieta ria Kristo, onye ebinto ebi mbirie ebiekeene; na onye mogosaba ase okwebeka inse ase chinkoro chiaino, ase okogania gwekeene, more nokwegena ase kristo, nabe okoorokia ekeene kiaye ase more, ase chinguru chi’Omoika Omochenu.
Na ase chinguru chi’Omoika Omochenu goika momanye ekeene kia amang’ana onsi.
Na kende gionsi kere ekiya na giekeene; naboigo kende gionsi ekiya tikeri komokana Kristo, korende nigo gekomanyia ng’a nareo.

nabo moramanye ng’a nareo, ase chinguru chiomoika omochenu; aseigo nigo inkobamanyia ng’a timokana chinguru chia Nyasae; ekiagera nigo chigokoreka ase chinguru koreng’ana n’okwegena kw’abana bamwanyabanto, rero, na mambia na kare na kare.

Naende nigo inkobamanyia, inwe abaminto, ng’a timokana ebiegwa bi’Omoika bia Nyasae, ekiagena nigo bire ebinge; na nigo bikorwa ase Nyasae oyomo. Na nchireo chinchera ao ao echio ebiegwa ebi bigokora emeremo; korende Nyasae oria oria oyomo ogokora onsi ase onsi; na nigo bikorugwa ase okororekana kw’Omoika oNyasae ase abanto, ase okobakonya.
Rigereria, ase omonto oyommo aegwa n’Omoika oria oNyasae, okworokereria ring’ana riobong’aini.
Na ase oyonde, aegwa kworokereria ring’ana riobong’aini n’omoika oria oria;
Naende ase oyonde aegwa okwegena okonene, na ase oyonde aegwa ebiegwa biokogwenia n’Omoika oria oria oyomo;
Naende ase oyonde, gokora emeremo y’ebikore ebinene;
Naende ase oyonde, aegwa okobana koreng’ana nebinto bionsi;
Naende ase oyonde aegwa okorora na komanya emeika ao ao;
Naende, ase oyonde, chingencho chi’onsi chiemenwa;
Naende ase oyonde, ogoonchoria gwechimeme na chingencho chiemenwa ao ao.
Na ebiegwa ebi bionsi nigo bigoetera ase Omoika o’kristo; na nigo ogocha ase kera omonto koreng’ana buna oganetie.
Na nimbe inkobamanyia, inwe abaminto ng’a kera ekeegwa ekiya nigo gekorwa ase Kristo.

Na nigo inkobamanyia, inwe abaminto, ng’a moinyore ng’a ere nere oria igoro rero na kare na kare, naboigo ebiegwa ebi bionsi nabeire ingokwana igoro yaye, ebio bire ebiekemoika, tibigosira nonya ense egotenena, gotatiga ase ogotegena kwa abana bamwanyabanto.
Ase ayio goika okwegena kobeo; na onye okwegena gokobao naboigo ogosemeria goika kobeo, na onye ogosemeria koreo naboigo obwanchani goika bobeo.
Na onye timokoba nobwanchani timogotoreka ase oborwoti bwa Nyasae; gose onye mokoba timori n’okwegena timogotoreka ase oborwoti bwa Nyasae; naboigo onye timokoba n’ogosemeria.
Na onye timori n’ogosemeria nigo moganetie gwatananwa; na ogwatananwa nigo gogocha ase engencho y’ebibe.
Na ekeene Kristo nigo akwanete ase abatata: Onye mokoba n’okwegena imonyare gokora ebinto bionsi bigwenerete ase inde.
Nabono nigo ngokwana igoro yaria onsi y’omoerio bw’ense ng’a onye rituko rigoika chinguru na ebiegwa bia Nyasae biranyare gokorekana egati yaino, naya nigo arabe ase engencho y’ogotegena.

Na okoragererigwa kobe ase abana bamwanyabanto onye aya akoba bo; na ase egati yaino onde takonyorekana okorete amaya. Korende onye oyomo okonyorekana egati yaino okorete amaya nigo arakore emeremo ase chinguru na ebiegwa bia Nyasae.

Nare n’okoragererigwa ere oyorakore amang’ana aya nagokwa, naboigo nigo barakwe ase ebibe biabo, na tibagotoreka ase oborwoti bwa Nyasae; na nigo ingokwana koreng’ana n’amang’ana a Kristo; na tindi koria oborimo.

Na nigo inkobamanyia ng’a moinyore amang’ana aya; ekiagera engaki neike bwango mokomanya ng’a tindi kong’ainereria, ekiagera ing’a mondore inde ase Nyasae; na Omonene Nyasae natebe ase more ng’a: Nintabatebetie amang’ana ane, ayio arigetwe n’omonto oyo, buna oria okorera korwa ase ogokwa, naboigo buna oria ogokwana korwa ase amaroba?
Nigo ngokwana amang’ana aya ase ogoikeranigwa kw’obobani. Na rigereria goika arwe ase omonwa oNyasae okare na kare; na amang’ana aya nabe akobao korwa ekegori goika ebigori bionsi.
Na Nyasae naorokie ase more ng’a aria onsi nabeire inkorika nayekeene.
Naende nigo nkobamanyia mobe mogocha ase Kristo, na koimokia kera ekeegwa ekiya’na timobwata ebiegwa biobobe, gose kende gionsi ekebe.

Naboigo boka na imoka korwa ase amaroba, O Yerusalem; nakobeka chiganchwa chiaino chindabu, O inwe abaiseke ba Zayoni; naboigo kongwa ebinyoro biaino na komenta chimbebe chiaino kare na kare erinde nario motabugwe, erinde nario obobwatoni bwa Tata okare na kare arosetie ase more, O inwe enyomba ya Israel, erinde aya anyare goikerana.

Inchwo ase Kristo na koba abachenu ase are na koyakana inwe mweka ayatari ayanyasae; na kamorayakane aya inwe mweka na komwancha Nyasae amo nechiriguru chiaino chionsi, nebirengererio na okobua kwaino, naboigo obuya bwaye nigo boisanegete ase more, na ase obuya obo monyare gokorwa abachenu ase Kristo; naboigo ase obuya obo bwa Nyasae mwabeire abachenu, ime ya Kristo, na timokwanga chinguru chia Nyasae.

Naende, goetera ase obuya bwa Nyasae, onye more abekeene ase Kristo, timokana chinguru chiaye, aseigo mwasibigwe ime ase Kristo goetera ase obuya bwa Nyasae, goetera ase ogoiteka kwa amanyinga a Yeso Kristo, obwe bore ase okobwatana gwa Tata ase okwaberwa kwebibe, naboigo koba abachenu motari na kemoa.

Na bono nigo nabaakeire okwaeri mwensi, ekiagera bwango nkogendainde gotimoka paradiso ya Nyasae, goika engaki omoika n’omobere one okobwatanigwa naende, na koretwa nobobui ase embeo, koumerana nainwe nyuma y’ogoikaransa kw’obonene bwa Yehova, oyore omonachi ebina okare na kare ase abare moyo na abakwete. Amina.
Omoerio Bw’egetabu kia Mormoni.
